name: Dont Underestimate a Big Carrot
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: A young genius, Cheng Xin, is mysteriously shot at an award ceremony for the Omniscient AI System. When he awakens, he finds himself transformed into a scruffy-looking radish spirit in the Secret Forest, and the omniscient system is haphazardly activated. Thus begins the legend of the Great Radish.Original Webtoon
